page.title: 19If I had to hide.
page.content: If I could run, I'd run to{Stone Cross {Church}at the junction of the A27 and THE B2104, with all the wildlife and plants on three sides of it. The birds nesting on the pews,the daisies and buttercups creeping through the stone on the ground. The rabbits, hedgehogs, mice and other little animals scampering about the floor. In the daytime owls and bats sleep soundly, hanging from and perching on the old beams in the roof. The remains of old pictures and paintings still hang on the walls. The roof tiles are cracked and missing, letting suc beams shine on the stone and light up the old church. Out at the back of the church cows and sheep graze in the fields. This building is a lovely old place. If I could I would stay at{Stone Cross {Church}forever. {HAZEL GUY.}
